about.intro: Mirlo provides a user-friendly space to help artists sell digital music, receive financial support, manage mailing lists, and share with their supporters.
about.missionStatement: <1>The music industry does not work for artists or listeners and needs a radical re-imagining.</1><1Mirlo hosts a community of artists, listeners, organizers, and coders who are daring to do just that: taking lessons learned from working in the solidarity economy and applying them to our platform.</1><1>We are building an online audio distribution and patronage platform that aims to be radical, accessible, open source (free & libre), modular, and standards based.</1>
about.behindThePlatformText: Our members have experience working both within Resonate and Ampled, other co-ops across several industries, and complex high-traffic web platforms. We envision this platform as a tool to support artists in cultivating direct and reciprocal relationships and resources to sustain one another’s creative practice.
about.featuresText:
Mirlo provides a space for artists to upload their music, establish their online presence, sell their music, and receive ongoing monthly contributions from their audience.

For a thorough look at our features for artists, check out our features page.
about.pricingText:
Mirlo takes a 7% cut of all transactions. So if an artist sells an album on for $10, Mirlo will earn 70 cents. Then, our payment processor Stripe, will take a cut of 2.9% + 30c (proportionally this is larger on small transactions).

Want to know more about how we calculated our take rate? Check out our blog post explaining how we got there.

As we develop our product and come to terms with the costs of running it, we will adjust these numbers and explore new ways of financing Mirlo.
about.morePricing: As we develop our product and come to terms with costs of running it, we will tweak these numbers and explore new ways of paying for the service and our work.

platformSlider.howMuchModalText: Mirlo thrives on artist contributions—whether through monthly support or a slice of album sales. But we get it: every cent counts, and only you know what you can afford. That’s why we let you decide how much of your sales goes to Mirlo. Your art, your call.

home.support: Directly support artists. Buy their music. Collectively owned and managed.
home.sustainedBy: Mirlo's work is sustained by our community, not by venture capital.
home.officeHours: Have more questions? Join us for <office>office hours</office>.
home.featuresLink: What is Mirlo? Check out <features>our features</features> and <about>about section</about>.
home.mirloConstruction:
Wanna talk more? E-mail us, join our Discord, or join us for office hours! Also check out our About page, and the code on GitHub.

Want to just receive our monthly newsletter? Sign up
home.supportUs: Want to support us as we grow Mirlo? <support>Pitch in</support>
